name: A lonely bowerbird
description:
A lonely bower bird

You are a lonely bower bird, impress a mate to stop being lonely!

Controls:

 WASD: To move

F: Interact / peck / pickup items / advance dialogue. 

 G: Fly upwards (hold g to glide)

Walk up to the female bird on the branch to see what she prefers each day!

Peck bushes to find more sticks / beetles!

Theme

This game was made for the Brackeys Gamejam 2022.2 the theme was: You are not alone. I interpreted this as You are alone at the start of the game, but if you finish the game You are not alone.

Goal:

Impress the female bowerbird by bringing gifts to the treasure area.
At the start of the day the female bowerbird will tell you what gift she prefers. Bringing her the gift she prefers will give you extra points. 
Improve your bower by dropping twigs on the bower construction area. 

At the end of the day the female bowerbird will let you know if she likes your bower.
Impress her 5 times to win!

Her likes ranked from low to high:

orange flower
berry
blue flower
blue beetle shell
gold beetle shell

She doesn't like loose twigs / leaves around the bower area. 

Known bugs:

Sometimes you don't respawn at the start but instead stay at where you ended the day. This seems to be some sort of Unity Bug with character controllers, hopefully will fix that soon!
